Coronaviruses are a family of viruses that can cause respiratory illness in humans. They get their name,corona, from the many crown-like spikes on the surface of the virus.Some common symptoms that have been specifically linked to COVID-19 include:shortness of breath,a cough that gets more severe over time,fever,chills,fatigue.Stopping the spread starts with you ,Wear a mask,Clean your hands,Maintain safe distance,Get vaccinated.
